title: Updated my 4XL, now I dont have any service, internet, no calls, no texting, only wifi
content:
I have tried rebooting
rebooted into safe mode to clear SIM cache, 
force stopped sim,
reset network settings
waited for an update
switched to 2g and 3g
removed and reinserted SIM card
Tried the sim in another phone and it worked

It was right after I updated my phone last week 11/11. My phone is completely useless in this form, im really dissapointed at this point. Please google just help me
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
